All Classes

Class Summary
Class Description
AppStarter
The AppStarter class will call the main method in Main class.
Cat
The Cat class is used to create cat objects and store the cats information.
CatController
The CatController class will be used for control of the main screen with tableview that is linked to the database.
DbConnection
The DbConnection class will be used as a utility class to allow connection to the database and to execute queries in the database.
LoginController
The LoginController class is used to control the login screen events.
Main
The Main class extends java Application library and contains the main method to run launch command required by JavaFX library.
PasswordHasher
The PasswordHasher class will be used as a utility class to hash passwords using "PBKDF2WithHmacSHA512" hashing algorithm from java.security library.
UserHolder
The UserHolder class is used as temporary storage to keep user details until the main cats screen is loaded.
UserInfo
The UserInfo class will be used to create user objects to store user UUID and names.
